title: How to Clean Dehydrator Shelves

steps.headline: Fill a bathtub with hot or boiling water.
steps.description: Fill enough to cover the shelves. Add the shelves to the filled bathtub.

steps.headline: Leave the shelves to soak for 15 minutes.
steps.description: After soaking, brush with a metal scourer. Alternatively, use a dish brush and include the smallest parts for better cleaning. Wear gloves to protect your skin from the hot water. Also wear the gloves if you have hard water and if you have irritated skin.

steps.headline: Fill the bathtub with boiling water or as hot as your hands can handle.
steps.description: Add the vinegar; the measuring ratio is 100ml vinegar to 20L water.

steps.headline: Soak the shelves for 10 minutes.
steps.description: Wearing rubber gloves, scrub the food particles off and leave to soak for another 5 minutes for disinfection.

steps.headline: Rinse well with cold water to get rid of the vinegar smell.
Rub dry with a dry rag until only water drops are left.
In boiling water, pour 2 cups of dish detergent to the bathtub.
steps.description: Since detergent is not that strong, soak it for 20 minutes.

text: Soaking in boiling water Fill a bathtub with hot or boiling water. Fill enough to cover the shelves. Add the shelves to the filled bathtub. Leave the shelves to soak for 15 minutes. After soaking, brush with a metal scourer. Alternatively, use a dish brush and include the smallest parts for better cleaning. Wear gloves to protect your skin from the hot water. Also wear the gloves if you have hard water and if you have irritated skin. Using vinegar Fill the bathtub with boiling water or as hot as your hands can handle. Add the vinegar; the measuring ratio is 100ml vinegar to 20L water. Soak the shelves for 10 minutes. Wearing rubber gloves, scrub the food particles off and leave to soak for another 5 minutes for disinfection. Rinse well with cold water to get rid of the vinegar smell.  Rub dry with a dry rag until only water drops are left.  Using detergent In boiling water, pour 2 cups of dish detergent to the bathtub. Since detergent is not that strong, soak it for 20 minutes. Scrub the shelves. Rinse well in cold water. Finished.
